sourcePackage.title: NXP i.MX6x SABRE Platform for Smart Devices
sourcePackage.description: This board support package is for the NXP SABRE Platform for Smart Devices board. This BSP contains prebuilt binaries and buildfiles to boot your board with the QNX Neutrino RTOS. In addition, this BSP provides source code for various drivers that you use can build. For documentation to use this BSP, download the user's guide.
